title: Area Most Likely to be Impacted by Acid Deposition

content.question: Which of the following locations would most likely receive acid deposition?

choices.label: A major city receiving its electricity from hydroelectric sources
A town downwind from a coal-fired power plant
A large lake downstream from a concentrated animal feeding operation
A stream flowing through agricultural land

content.answer: A town downwind from a coal-fired power plant

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
